repo.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability
repo.name: neovim

body:
Probelem: inccommand has default value, when run substitute in exmode will show preview.

Solution: check if its in exmode.

Fix #26056

comment_data.body:
```suggestion
      && *p_icm != NUL       // 'inccommand' is set
      && !exmode_active      // not in ex mode
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -2632,7 +2632,7 @@ static int command_line_changed(CommandLineState *s)
   const bool prev_cmdpreview = cmdpreview;
   if (s->firstc == ':'
       && current_sctx.sc_sid == 0    // only if interactive
-      && *p_icm != NUL       // 'inccommand' is set
+      && (*p_icm != NUL && !exmode_active)  // 'inccommand' is set and not in ex mode

@@ -1097,3 +1097,23 @@ describe('user session', function()
     eq(1, eval('g:lua_session'))
   end)
 end)
+
+describe('inccommand on ex mode', function()
+  it('should not preview', function()
+    clear()
+    local screen
+    screen = Screen.new(60, 10)
+    screen:attach()
+    local id = funcs.termopen({ nvim_prog, '-u', 'NONE', '-c', 'set termguicolors', '-E', 'test/README.md' })

@@ -1097,3 +1097,23 @@ describe('user session', function()
     eq(1, eval('g:lua_session'))
   end)
 end)
+
+describe('inccommand on ex mode', function()
+  it('should not preview', function()
+    clear()
+    local screen
+    screen = Screen.new(60, 10)
+    screen:attach()
+    local id = funcs.termopen({ nvim_prog, '-u', 'NONE', '-c', 'set termguicolors', '-E', 'test/README.md' })

@@ -1097,3 +1097,23 @@ describe('user session', function()
     eq(1, eval('g:lua_session'))
   end)
 end)
+
+describe('inccommand on ex mode', function()
+  it('should not preview', function()
+    clear()
+    local screen
+    screen = Screen.new(60, 10)
+    screen:attach()
+    local id = funcs.termopen({ nvim_prog, '--clean', '-u', 'NONE', '-E', 'test/README.md' })

comment_data.body: Regardless of `VIMRUNTIMEPATH`, we should do either `--clean` or `-u NONE -i NONE`, shouldn't we?
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1097,3 +1097,23 @@ describe('user session', function()
     eq(1, eval('g:lua_session'))
   end)
 end)
+
+describe('inccommand on ex mode', function()
+  it('should not preview', function()
+    clear()
+    local screen
+    screen = Screen.new(60, 10)
+    screen:attach()
+    local id = funcs.termopen({ nvim_prog, '-u', 'NONE', '-c', 'set termguicolors', '-E', 'test/README.md' })

comment_regular_data.body: Shouldn't we add a regression test for this?

title: fix(inccommand): don't preview when in ex mode
